altername_name: Nice Price Series Vol. 08 - Elemental Pinball
name: Elemental Pinball
overview: Step inside the arcades with Elemental Pinball. Use all your skills and the unique Elemental power up system to knock down the stand-up-targets and release those multi score multipliers. Adjust the ball speed and use the power of Fire, Water and Lightning to maximum effect to beat the ranking system and notch up a perfect high-score. Do you have what it takes to tilt and flip your way to victory? Elemental Pinball is a pinball game that features 3 different tables (Disco Round, Sea Round & Jester Round) each of them with their own music, a good ball movement and the posibility of adjust the number of balls (lives) and the ball speed.
